info.author: Pontus Ekberg
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: GNU General Public License (GPL)
info.description:
Comix is a user-friendly, customizable image viewer. It is specifically designed
to handle comic books, but also serves as a generic viewer. It reads images in
ZIP, RAR or tar archives (also gzip or bzip2 compressed) as well as plain image
files.
info.keywords: comic book image viewer zip rar tar cbz cbr cbt gtk
info.name: Comix
info.summary: A GTK+ comic book viewer for .cbz, .cbr and .cbt files.
info.html_description: Comix is a user-friendly, customizable image viewer. It is specifically designed to handle comic books, but also serves as a generic viewer. It reads images in ZIP, RAR or tar archives (also gzip or bzip2 compressed) as well as plain image files.
